page.title: 09ATTITUDES TO THE AREA (cont)
page.content: We asked if any amenities were lacking 7 people said there were none, others included (in order most popular first) theatres, chemists, entertainment, youth entertainment, clean beaches, surgeries, discos, free beaches, garden parks, shops, bus sevices, playgroups, police patrols, concert halls (for classical music), and sporting facilities. 2 people had lived here for between 0 and 3 years, 6 people between 3 and 6 years, 3 people betwen 6 and 10 years, 8 people between 10 and 15 years, 3 people between 15 and 20 years, and 3 people had lived in the area for 20 years or more. We asked people about there television viewing habits. Most people watched between 2 and 4 hours an evening, the most popular channel being BBC followed by ITV and C4.{
